<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boots of Free Running](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2456)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These comfortable and practical boots slip on easily and fill you with boundless energy. The treads of these boots provide exceptional traction, with improved grip on surfaces you would traditionally have difficulty traversing. While wearing the boots, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) and to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) and [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37).

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The traction of your boots improves, allowing you to run along vertical surfaces for 1 minute. When you Stride, you can run up solid vertical surfaces, like walls, at your full Speed. You must start your movement on a horizontal surface. If you end a Stride off the ground, you must Stride along the surface again until you reach a horizontal surface or you begin to fall (though you can [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95), if applicable). If you have means of walking on water, such as with [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) or similar abilities, you can also run along flimsy vertical surfaces, as well as vertical liquids such as a waterfall.

</column>

</column>

<title

right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Free Running (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,350 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2. You can activate the _moderate boots of free running_ once per hour instead of once per day.

<title
level="2"

pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3. You can activate the _greater boots of free running_ without a frequency limit.
